name: undiscriminating
content:
Add to word list

not able to know and act on the difference between good and bad quality: My brother has an undiscriminating palate -- he puts tomato sauce on everything. Are we undiscriminating supermarket consumers really endangering our health? Young birds are not completely undiscriminating; they do have preferences.
